Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an excellent chance to experience the benefits of our product at a discount compared to the market value of $150. I trust it will meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
